content.rendered:
Microsoft Office 2019 Home & Student comes with all the classic apps you need to get your work done at home or in your small business. It includes the 2019 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint
  • This is an outright purchase of Office 2019 Home & Student so you don’t have to worry about renewals.
  • You will receive the classic 2016 versions of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint.
  • The 2019 version of Excel comes with a variety of new chart types allowing you to display your data in different ways.
  • PowerPoint includes a new Zoom option which allows you to deliver non-linear presentations, seamlessly switching between slides.
  • Works for PC Only, Windows 10 Supported

excerpt.rendered:
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by WhatsApp or Write to us at: support@codesforever.com

its is Digital Download which means Activation Code and Download link sent to via Email Only.

No CD/DVD/USB has been physically shipped to you

The key is for 1 device only.

This is a 100 % Original Microsoft Office 2019 Home & Student Product Key 

The product key will activate the  full version of Microsoft Office 2016 Professional Plus

It’s compatible with PCs running Windows 10 Only

The Microsoft Office 2019 Home & Student  will activate the multilingual language version. Any language version is supported. For example English, Spanish, German, French .( 32/64 bit support )
